news.title: Business meeting with the delegation from India.
news.text: September 10, 2021 Lawyer of LEX Law Firm Aliya Palvanovna took part in business-meeting of Indian delegation headed by the President of Indian Economic Trade Organization Dr. Asif Iqbal with entrepreneurs of the Kyrgyz...
